label: CommunicationEvent
comment: A significant occurrence or happening communicated by means of sending or receiving information, such as transmitting digital data by using the internet.

datatypeProperties.comment: A date, time, date time, or other date time of an occurrence in this supply chain schedule.
A code specifying a reason for the declared error.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: Representation of real world phenomenon associated with a location relative to the Earth, such as cities, buildings, roads, rivers, forests and lakes.
A logistics location where this supply chain event occurs.
The operational responsible party for this communication event.

referencedBy.comment: A matching event for this communication pairing.
A significant occurrence or happening communicated by means of sending or receiving information, such as transmitting digital data by using the internet.
